atk_abil: Normal Attack : Attacks enemy units and knocks them back by throwing a number of cards. (Knock-back)

Skill Attack : Deals damage to enemy units by throwing cards and turns them into rabbits for a certain period of time. But, air units, large units ( Golem, Big Foot, Hands of Death, Ent ) cannot be transformed.
Special Ability 1 : Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%. ( If double speed is applied, the game speed increases by 2.04x cumulatively )
Special Ability 2 : Increases the attack range and attack speed of all units by 2%.

Spirit Awakening : Maximum level-up increases by 5 for all units. ( [Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop. )
